resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1968</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Project:School Uniforms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Project:School Uniformen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Uniformes de Project:School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uniformes De Project:School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uniformi di Project:School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Project:School στολές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uniformes de Project:School</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a guide for an intermediate English student project where the students consider the importance and nature of school uniforms around the world.The project includes written and oral presentations. Assessment rubrics, time schedule , checklist and reflection forms are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">school uniforms</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Anleitung für ein englisches 
Kursteilnehmerzwischenprojekt, in dem die Kursteilnehmer den Wert 
betrachten und Natur der Schuleuniformen um das world.The Projekt die 
geschriebenen und Munddarstellungen einschließt. Einschätzung 
Rubriken, Zeitplan, Checkliste und Reflexion Formulare werden zur 
Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un guide pour un projet anglais 
intermédiaire d'étudiant où les étudiants considèrent 
l'importance et la nature des uniformes d'école autour du projet de 
world.The inclut des présentations écrites et orales. Des 
rubriques d'évaluation, le calendrier, la liste de contrôle et les 
formes de réflexion sont fournis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma guia para um projeto inglês 
intermediário do estudante onde os estudantes considerem a 
importância e a natureza de uniformes da escola em torno do projeto 
de world.The inclua apresentações escritas e orais. Os rubrics
da avaliação, a programação de tempo, a lista de verificação e 
os formulários da reflexão são fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una guida per un progetto inglese 
intermedio dell'allievo dove gli allievi considerano l'importanza e la
natura delle uniformi della scuola intorno al progetto di world.The
include le presentazioni scritte ed orali. Le rubriche di 
valutazione, i tempi previsti, la lista di controllo e le forme di 
riflessione sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας οδηγός για ένα ενδιάμεσο αγγλικό 
πρόγραμμα σπουδαστών όπου οι σπουδαστές εξετάζουν τη σημασία και
τη φύση των σχολικών στολών σε όλο τον κόσμο Το πρόγραμμα 
περιλαμβάνει τις γραπτές και προφορικές παρουσιάσεις. Οι 
μορφές ρουμπρικών αξιολόγησης, χρονικού προγράμματος, πινάκων 
ελέγχου και αντανάκλασης παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una guía para un proyecto inglés 
intermedio del estudiante donde los estudiantes consideran la 
importancia y la naturaleza de los uniformes de la escuela alrededor
del proyecto de world.The incluye presentaciones escritas y orales. 
Se proporcionan las rúbricas del gravamen, el horario de 
tiempo, la lista de comprobación y las formas de la reflexión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schuleuniformen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">uniformes d'école</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uniformes da escola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">uniformi della scuola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχολικές στολές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">uniformes de la escuela</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
